div.l: At Trumpyngton̄ not ferr͗e fro Caumbrigge
Ther gothe a broke · and oủer þat A brygge
Vp on̄ the which Broke there stante a mylle
This ys veray soth þat y you telle
A Mylner͗e was there dwellynge many a day
As any pecok he was proude and gay
Pypen̄ he cowde and fysshen̄ and nettꝭes bete
And turne coppꝭes wrastle and shete
Ay by his belt he bare a long panade
And of a swerde full trenchaunt was þe blade
A Joly popper bare he in his pouche
Ther durste no man̄ for ꝑperylle hȳm touche
A Scheffeld thwytel bare he in his hose
Rounde was his fase and camuse was his nose
As pylled as an ape was his skulle
He was a mᵃarket beter at þe Fulle
There was no wyght þᵗat durst hond on hȳm leygge
But yf he swor͗e anon̄e he schuld abygge
A thefe he was forsothe of corne and mele
And that slygh and vsyng for to stele
His name was hote deynous Symkyn̄
A wyfe he hadde com̄e of nobul kynne
The person̄ of the toun̄ her fader was
With hur͗e he yaffe full many a panne of Brasse
For þat Symkyn̄ schuld in his blode allye
Sche was y Fosterd in a nonnery
For Symkyn̄ wold no wyf as he sayd
But sche wer͗e well noryssched ⁊and a mayd
To save his estate of yemanry
And sche was proude and perte as a pye
A full fayre sight was up on hem two
On halydayꝭes byforne hur wold he goo
With his typet wounden̄ aboute his hede
And sche cam̄ after in a gyte of Rede
And Symkyn̄ had hosen̄ of þe same
There durst no wyght clepe hur͗e but dame
